description:
In this course you'll learn how to create and promote classes on the Skillshare platform.Â 

Whether you're starting from scratch with your first class, or are taking Udemy courses to Skillshare, this course explains everything you need to know.

Skillshare is very different to Udemy. The classes can be as small as 10 minutes long and are sorted by "trending" score, which is explained in the course. We also cover how to get "followers", how to create a great Skillshare class, how the SEO side of Skillshare works, and much more, including many marketing tips and tactics you can use to improve your Skillshare success.
title: Skillshare Success System - Skillshare Explained!
